ygData.subject: Re: I will no longer post updates to this list.  (txt)
ygData.msgSnippet: I am fine with it..If he wants to post his webaddress then so be it...You don t have to goto it. That is your choice...And he does have nice info...and it s
ygData.messageBody:
I am fine with it..If he wants to post his webaddress then so be it...You
don't have to goto it. That is your choice...And he does have nice
info...and it's nice to know about these other sites...So keep up the good
work...

Crag, lvl 15 warrior, The Rathe

----- Original Message -----
From: <patrick.r.baxter@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 1:41 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] I will no longer post updates to this list.
(txt)


> From: patrick.r.baxter@...
>
> Didn't mean to sink your boat... there are several forums that your web
page
> would be quite welcome in. This just doesn't happen to be one made for
that
> sort of thing. Go back to Onelist and fine the general forum and post
there,
> I am sure you will get a better responce from that crowd.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Charles Adams [mailto:sirkal@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:53 AM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] I will no longer post updates to this list.
> (txt)
>
>
> From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
>
> I'd like to start off by thanking Reedo, Chet, and David for their kind
> words.
>
> Unfortunately far more people seem to think I am some kind of loser for
> trying tell you all that my site is out there. I was under the impression
> that this mailing list was to keep people informed about EverQuest, and
> particularly about Smithing.
>
> I have decided to no longer post any messages to any boards or lists. I am
> now doing this site solely for my friends and those people who manage to
> find it. I am sick of people complaining about something I do for free to
> help them.
>
> If you want to be kept abreast of changes, just e-mail me saying so and I
> will send an update notice directly to you.
>
> I think the site has a lot of potential considering that all the info
comes
> from me, and I have no real HTML experience. (Just bought a book
yesterday.)
>
> Sorry to have bothered anyone.
>
> Charles Adams
>
>
> From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
> Personally I'm really glad that he posted his web address. He has some of
> the best info on blacksmithing on the web.
>
>
> >From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
> >
> >Agreed! I like when smaller sites tell people they have updates. I don't
> >like it when they flood everyone, but I've only seen 2 posts from this
guy,
> >and I like his site. If he gets time to work on it, it could be very very
> >benificial. I've been there a couple of times, and like the info there.
> >
> >I've not had bad experience with people on boards, as I don't post much
and
> >I delete babble very quickly. *shrug* Was annoying to come into work
Monday
> >and have 149 new messages waiting...
> >
> >-Zantaer, Fennin Ro
> >
>
> >From: "Chet Watkins" <chetwatkins@...>
> >
> >Has everyone on this game gone postal???!!! WHO CARES!!! If he has an
> update
> >
> >to his web site and he wants to post it up here for people to check out,
> LET
> >
> >HIM!! It does deal with EQ and that should be all that really matters. I
am
>
> >seeing a bad trend on the message board and in game and it has a lot to
do
> >with things like this. PEOPLE ARE GETTING RUDE. I had better run ins with
> >pkers on UO then with the people im seeing in EQ and the mailing list.
> >Please, Everyone just sit back, relax, and enjoy the info we recieve. I
> know
> >
> >as well as anyone else reading these that your probably at work, if you
> >werent you would be playing right now, so dont tell me you have something
> >better to be doing then reading these posts. I'm not saying post anything
> >and everything, but this mailing list has done very well about staying on
> >subject, a couple of links to eq info sites is not going to kill anyone.
> >
> >Rant over, return to your normal blacksmithing news.
> >
>
> Xezol - Lvl 13 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
>
